channel.title: Server Help!?!?!?!? Ip is 0.0.0.0 on server?
channel.description:
When i run my server it says starting server on port 43594, and it starts my ip on 0.0.0.0 :confused: How do i change that???? My ip isn't 0.0.0.0 plz help :eek:
watch.....

item.title: Server Help!?!?!?!? Ip is 0.0.0.0 on server?

wait so that means that the server runs under my getaway ip???

item.title: Server Help!?!?!?!? Ip is 0.0.0.0 on server?
item.dc:creator: @MikeX MikeX
item.description:
@MikeX wrote:

[quote=“hot server, post:3, topic:180410”]Well to you IT is… because it doesnt have to connect to a distant computer…
example: if my lan network was on… my computer address is… 192.168.XXX.XXX then i would use that to connect to someone through my gateway

please CONNECT me if im wrong[/quote]

*Correct

Read full topic
